Text: Here’s a new episode of Cognition, Cognition The Wise Monkey, in second episode The Wise Monkey continues the story as someone close to Erica is kidnapped by the Wise Monkey, a serial killer fixated on the gruesome mutilation of their victims, Erica is in a race against time to save her life. With the Wise Monkey case in her hands and the FBI’s resources already stretched thin, sheÆs on her own to find the killer before it’s too late – again.. Enjoy!
